attributes.action: Knight SUFC manager Chris Wilder given his recent record breaking achievement
attributes.additional_details: Chris Wilder should be recognised for his exceptional service to Sheffield United FC. This should be discussed within parliament.
attributes.background: Open for discussion the potential knighthood of Sheffield United manager Chris Wilder for his services to Sheffield United Football Club.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
